prompts: Create a playful Psychic-type Pokemon with bright colors and a whimsical design.
Imagine a unique Pokemon that uses its mime abilities to confuse opponents in battle.
Show me a bipedal Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and has a colorful appearance.
Generate a character that embodies the essence of mime artistry in a Pokemon form.
Design a Pokemon with a jester-like outfit that has both red and blue accents.
Give me a quirky Pokemon that specializes in psychological attacks and playful trickery.
Make a Pokemon that combines elements of performance art and psychic abilities.
